title: Which is the best IPU affiliated college in terms of good placements in Greater Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well there is only one college i.e Delhi technical campus (DTC) affiliated to IPU having no good placement like any other colleges. But some other colleges like Galgotia, G.L. bajaj, IIMT these are the some colleges having good placement records Good luck!
Best college affiliated with IPU in terms of good placement is JIMS Greater Noida(JEMTEC). There are various other colleges too in Greater Noida but affiliated with IPU is JEMTEC.
